info.title: API Documentation | NFTGo
info.description:
Note: You can find our listing criteria here: https://docs.nftgo.io/docs/listing-criteria

# Introduction
[NFTGo.io](https://nftgo.io/) is a data analytics platform for NFTs. We provide support for NFTs on the Ethereum blockchain. This API includes:
* Support for metrics like Market Cap and Volume (globally and per-collection)
* NFT metadata and price information
* Access to the custom rarity model
* Address and portfolio tracking
* Collection transaction history
* NFT and profit rankings
* .. And much more!

# Authentication
To start exploring the NFTGo API, you need to sign up for an API key [here](https://nftgo.io/data-api/).
Using your API key, you can make requests to the NFTGo API by sending the API key as a **header** in your request. Below is an example:
```Bash
curl http://127.0.0.1:5001/<your-request-url> -H X-API-KEY:<YOUR-API-KEY>
```

All requests should be prefixed with [http://127.0.0.1:5001/.](http://127.0.0.1:5001/)

# Rate limits
Currently, we have a rate limit of 5 request per second (5RPS). If your project needs a specialized plan, you can contact us [here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdToHwUCisiDhNiW_UcVdRgjjLxLNt3fW1cruvZoPpxKxJuGQ/viewform).

parameters.description: Queries can be bounded by a Start Time and End Time. Start Time is the earliest timestamp to include in the transaction query, formatted as an UTC timestamp in seconds or ISO 8601 format date time string, such as 2022-08-20T00:00:00+00:00. Start Time limited to 2021-09-01T00:00:00+00:00 or later.

schema.title: Start Time
schema.description: Queries can be bounded by a Start Time and End Time. Start Time is the earliest timestamp to include in the transaction query, formatted as an UTC timestamp in seconds or ISO 8601 format date time string, such as 2022-08-20T00:00:00+00:00. Start Time limited to 2021-09-01T00:00:00+00:00 or later.

parameters.name: start_time

parameters.description: Where an End Time is specified, transaction queries will fetch all transactions up to but excluding the End Time, which is formatted as an UTC timestamp in seconds or ISO 8601 format date time string. The query window varies according to the plan.

schema.description: Where an End Time is specified, transaction queries will fetch all transactions up to but excluding the End Time, which is formatted as an UTC timestamp in seconds or ISO 8601 format date time string. The query window varies according to the plan.

Collection.title: Collection

collection_id.title: Collection Id
collection_id.description: The collection id of the collection

blockchain.title: Blockchain
blockchain.description: The blockchain the collection belongs to

slug.title: Slug
slug.description: A slug is generated from a collection name by using applying lower-case to all letters in the collection name and replacing all spaces with a '-'

opensea_slug.title: Opensea Slug
opensea_slug.description: An opensea slug is generated from the corresponding opensea url link

description.title: Description
description.example: The Bored Ape Yacht Club is a collection of 10,000 unique Bored Ape NFTs— unique digital collectibles living on the Ethereum blockchain. Your Bored Ape doubles as your Yacht Club membership card, and grants access to members-only benefits, the first of which is access to THE BATHROOM, a collaborative graffiti board. Future areas and perks can be unlocked by the community through roadmap activation.

address.title: Address
address.description: Ethereum address, 42-character hexadecimal string beginning with 0x

start_hold_time.title: Start Hold Time
start_hold_time.description: The timestamp (in seconds) when the owner starts holding the NFT

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: The quantity of NFTs that the owner holds

total.title: Total
total.description: The total count of the NFT holders

nft_num.title: Nft Num
nft_num.description: The number of NFTs owned by this address

collection_num.title: Collection Num
collection_num.description: The number of collections owned by this address

usd_value.title: Usd Value
usd_value.description: Profit and loss is the sum of realized profit made from sales and estimated unrealized profit of NFTs held by the address.

collection_id.title: Collection Id
collection_id.description: The collection id of the collection

circulating_supply.title: Circulating Supply
circulating_supply.description: The total number of NFTs in a collection.

market_cap.title: Market Cap
market_cap.description: The market capitalization of a collection reflecting the total market value of a collection and is calculated as the sum of the last trade price of each item in the collection.

buyer_num.title: Buyer Num
buyer_num.description: The number of buyers over certain interval (24h/7d/30d)

seller_num.title: Seller Num
seller_num.description: The number of sellers over certain interval (24h/7d/30d)

trader_num.title: Trader Num
trader_num.description: The number of unique addresses buying or selling over certain interval (24h/7d/30d), note that 'trader_num ≠ buyer_num + seller_num', as some addresses may generate both buy and sell transactions

transfer_num.title: Transfer Num
transfer_num.description: The number of transfer transactions over a specified time frame, which includes mint and burn transactions

holder_num.title: Holder Num
holder_num.description: The number of holders of NFTs in a collection

owner_addresses.title: Owner Addresses
owner_addresses.description: List of owner addresses currently holding the NFT.         A list of one address if it's an ERC721 NFT. A list of addresses if it's an ERC1155 NFT.

traits.title: Traits
traits.description: The list of NFT traits. Traits consist of a series of types and values, referring to the feature of an NFT. For example, if a project has avatar NFTs, the traits may include headwear, facial traits, clothes, etc. Traits make each item in an NFT collection unique and determine its rarity in a collection.

rarity.title: Rarity
rarity.description: NFT Rarity score. Calculation methods can be seen as below: https://mirror.xyz/nftgoio.eth/kHWaMtNY6ZOvDzr7PR99D03--VNu6-ZOjYuf6E9-QH0

extra_info.title: Extra Info
extra_info.description: The extra info of the item. Only for Solana and BTC.
